amendment.description: An amendment numbered 95 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds from being used to prohibit funds from being used to produce official documents containing the term "latinx" or "latin-x.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Salazar amendment (A061) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 198 (Roll no. 640).
